spell.name: Poison Wave
entries: A wave of poisonous fumes emanates from you in a 15-foot-radius sphere. Creatures within 30 feet of you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, each creature takes {@damage 4d12} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of your next turn. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage and does not become {@condition poisoned}.

components.m: a withered root and a drop of vinegar

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.
